org.sakaiproject.util

Class StringUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.StringUtil
  • Deprecated. 
    use commons-lang StringUtils, this will be removed after 2.9 - Dec 2011

    @Deprecated
public class StringUtil
extends Object

    StringUtil collects together some string utility classes.

             int index,
             int length,
             String splitter)
        Deprecated. 
        Reverse the split operation.
        Parameters:
        parts - The parts to combine
        index - the index to the fist part to use
        length - the number of parts to use
        splitter - The between-parts text

      • splitFirst

        public static String[] splitFirst(String source,
                  String splitter)
        Deprecated. 
        Split the source into two strings at the first occurrence of the splitter Subsequent occurrences are not treated specially, and may be part of the second string.
        Parameters:
        source - The string to split
        splitter - The string that forms the boundary between the two strings returned.
        Returns:
        An array of two strings split from source by splitter.

      • referencePath

        public static String referencePath(String ref)
        Deprecated. 
        Compute the reference path (i.e. the container) for a given reference.
        Parameters:
        ref - The reference string.
        Returns:
        The reference root for the given reference.

      • fullReference

        public static String fullReference(String root,
                   String relative)
        Deprecated. 
        Create a full reference from a relative reference merged with a root reference.
        Parameters:
        root - The root reference, which is the root of the full reference.
        relative - The relative reference, to add to the path of the root.
        Returns:
        A full reference from the root and relative references.

      • trimToNull

        public static String trimToNull(String value)
        Deprecated. use commons-lang StringUtils.trimToNull
        Trim blanks, and if nothing left, make null.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to trim.
        Returns:
        value trimmed of blanks, and if nothing left, made null.

      • trimToNullLower

        public static String trimToNullLower(String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Trim blanks, and if nothing left, make null, else lowercase.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to trim.
        Returns:
        value trimmed of blanks, lower cased, and if nothing left, made null.

      • trimToZero

        public static String trimToZero(String value)
        Deprecated. use commons-lang StringUtils.trimToEmpty
        Trim blanks, and assure there is a value, and it's not null.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to trim.
        Returns:
        value trimmed of blanks, assuring it not to be null.

      • trimToZeroLower

        public static String trimToZeroLower(String value)
        Deprecated. 
        Trim blanks, and assure there is a value, and it's not null, then lowercase.
        Parameters:
        value - The string to trim.
        Returns:
        value trimmed of blanks, lower cased, assuring it not to be null.

      • containsIgnoreCase

        public static boolean containsIgnoreCase(String target,
                         String substring)
        Deprecated. 
        Check if the target contains the substring anywhere, ignore case.
        Parameters:
        target - The string to check.
        substring - The value to check for.
        Returns:
        true of the target contains the substring anywhere, ignore case, or false if it does not.

      • different

        public static boolean different(String a,
                String b)
        Deprecated. 
        Compare two strings for differences, either may be null
        Parameters:
        a - One String.
        b - The other String.
        Returns:
        true if the strings are different, false if they are the same.

      • different

        public static boolean different(String a,
                String b,
                boolean ignoreCase)
        Deprecated. 
        Compare two strings for differences, either may be null, ignore case if specified
        Parameters:
        a - One String.
        b - The other String.
        ignoreCase - if true, we will do the compare case insensitive.
        Returns:
        true if the strings are different, false if they are the same.

      • different

        public static boolean different(String[] a,
                String[] b)
        Deprecated. 
        Compare two String[] for differences, either may be null
        Parameters:
        a - One String[].
        b - The other String[].
        Returns:
        true if the String[]s are different, false if they are the same.

      • different

        public static boolean different(byte[] a,
                byte[] b)
        Deprecated. 
        Compare two byte[] for differences, either may be null
        Parameters:
        a - One byte[].
        b - The other byte[].
        Returns:
        true if the byte[]s are different, false if they are the same.

        public static String limit(String value,
           int length)
        Deprecated. 
        Limit the string to a certain number of characters, adding "..." if it was truncated
        Parameters:
        value - The string to limit.
        length - the length to limit to (as an int).
        Returns:
        The limited string.
